subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Sidney Lowe, a former North Carolina State point guard, earned his first big victory as its coach when the Wolfpack defeated No. 3 North Carolina, 83-79, in the kind of rivalry game he was hired to win.
snippet: Sidney Lowe, a former North Carolina State point guard, earned his first big victory as its coach when the Wolfpack defeated No. 3 North Carolina, 83-79, in the kind of rivalry game he was hired to win.
